title: Idol Livestream: Fashion Game
description: Idol Livestream: Fashion Game is a beauty fashion game that puts your designer skills to the test by dressing up a character just waiting to become trandy with stylish clothes, accessories, and makeup. After whipping up the perfect look, you get to showcase your creations on a livestream. Express your creativity, wow the audience, and climb the top of the popularity ladder to become a true fashion star!
